content.text: Match ends, Everton 4, Leicester City 2.

Goal!  Everton 4, Leicester City 2. Romelu Lukaku (Everton) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Phil Jagielka following a corner.
